con:config.script:
import groovy.util.* import groovy.json.*
def json = context.expand( '${GetELSegments#Response}' ) if (json == 'null') testRunner.gotoStepByName("Add EL Segment") else testRunner.gotoStepByName("ELSegmentCheckCount")

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion for HTTP Status Code
Smart Assertion for HTTP Status Code

con:restRequest.name: AddActiveSegmentData
con:restRequest.con:request: { "SegmentTypeName": "EL_SEGMENT", "SegmentDataName": "INACTIVESEGMENTDATA${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyyMMddss").format(new Date())}", "DataTypeCode": "Number", "Description": "This segment data is used for automation", "Status": "A" }

con:assertion.name: Smart Assertion for HTTP Status codes

con:elements.con:expectedValue: HTTP/1.1 200 OK, HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed

con:config.script:
